mapper.select: SELECT -- 进港查验数量 COUNT(CASE WHEN port_operation_status = '进港' THEN 1 END) as inPortCount, -- 出港查验数量 COUNT(CASE WHEN port_operation_status = '出港' THEN 1 END) as outPortCount, -- 装卸货量总计 COALESCE(SUM(loaded_unloaded_cargo_tonnage), 0) as totalCargoTonnage, -- 往来港口数量（不同的上/下一港） COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN previous_next_port IS NOT NULL AND previous_next_port != '' THEN previous_next_port END) as portCount, -- 船籍港数量（不同的船籍港） COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN port_of_registry IS NOT NULL AND port_of_registry != '' THEN port_of_registry END) as registryPortCount FROM ship_port_log WHERE inspection_datetime >= #{startDate} AND inspection_datetime <= CONCAT(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59')

SELECT
DATE(lo.inspection_datetime) as timeLabel, DATE_FORMAT(lo.inspection_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as timeDisplay
CONCAT(YEAR(lo.inspection_datetime), '-W', LPAD(WEEK(lo.inspection_datetime, 1), 2, '0')) as timeLabel, CONCAT(YEAR(lo.inspection_datetime), '年第', WEEK(lo.inspection_datetime, 1), '周') as timeDisplay
DATE_FORMAT(lo.inspection_datetime, '%Y-%m') as timeLabel, DATE_FORMAT(lo.inspection_datetime, '%Y年%m月') as timeDisplay
YEAR(lo.inspection_datetime) as timeLabel, CONCAT(YEAR(lo.inspection_datetime), '年') as timeDisplay
DATE(lo.inspection_datetime) as timeLabel, DATE_FORMAT(lo.inspection_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') as timeDisplay
, COUNT(CASE WHEN lo.port_operation_status = '进港' THEN 1 END) as inPortCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN lo.port_operation_status = '出港' THEN 1 END) as outPortCount FROM ship_port_log lo LEFT JOIN international_berth ib ON ib.泊位 = lo.berthing_location WHERE lo.inspection_datetime >= #{startDate} AND lo.inspection_datetime <= CONCAT(#{endDate}, ' 23:59:59')
AND ib.码头 = #{berthingLocation}
AND lo.ship_category = #{shipCategory}
GROUP BY timeLabel, timeDisplay ORDER BY timeLabel

SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN ib.码头 IS NOT NULL AND ib.码头 != '' THEN ib.码头 ELSE lo.berthing_location END as berthingLocation FROM ship_port_log lo LEFT JOIN international_berth ib ON ib.泊位 = lo.berthing_location WHERE lo.berthing_location IS NOT NULL AND lo.berthing_location != '' ORDER BY berthingLocation
SELECT DISTINCT ship_category FROM ship_port_log WHERE ship_category IS NOT NULL AND ship_category != '' ORDER BY ship_category
